Some 100 Ukrainian troops have arrived at Oklahoma's Fort Sill in the U.S. to begin training on the highly sought-after Patriot missile defense system for protection against Russia's missile attacks. Meanwhile, video footage has been released showing seven Ukrainian civilians, including a five-year-old girl, being evacuated last week from a village outside Soledar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Conservative government has presented MPs with a bill that would require unionised professions to provide a minimum level of service during strikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Monday night it passed the latest parliamentary stage after 309 ministers voted in favour of the legislation. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak tweeted saying his government was one step closer to stopping what he called disruptive protests. Under the disputed bill, some employees would be required to work during a strike and could be sacked if they refuse.

It's an outrage to democracy that the UK Parliament is now seeking to overturn that. Scotland's First Minister Nicola Sturgeon has called the move a full frontal attack, tweeting if this Westminster veto succeeds it will be the first of many. The UK government's Scottish secretary will take legal steps on Tuesday to confirm the move and set out reasons for it in a statement to the House of Commons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It's a horrifying discovery and another blow to the image of the London Metropolitan Police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: On Monday, a police officer pled guilty to 49 offences including false imprisonment, coercive control, sexual assault and 24 counts of rape on 12 women. Police and prosecutors say Officer David Carrick exploited his position as a Met officer to lure women and then terrorise them into staying silent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Anyone hearing of the 49 counts David Carrick has pleaded guilty to against 12 victims would agree the sheer magnitude of his offending is horrifying. This is a man who relentlessly degraded, belittled, sexually assaulted and raped women. As time went on, the severity of his offending intensified as he became emboldened, thinking he would get away with it. The police force apologised after nine incidents involving the officer between 2001 and 2021 became public.
